mapper.sql: p.id, p.address, p.company, p.createTime, p.createUser, p.personName, p.personNo, p.phone, p.salary, p.sex, p.status, pe.mail,pe.hobby
mapper.insert:
insert into person_extend (person_no, mail, hobby, create_time) values
(#{item.personNo}, #{item.mail}, #{item.hobby}, now())
